name: Industrial and Craft Exhibition in Malmö
obverse: Bust of Oscar II facing left.
obverse_inscriptions: OSCAR II SVERIGES OCH NORGES KONUNG
reverse: A topless angel is blowing into a horn held in her left hand. In her right hand she holds a wreath. Her right wrist is resting on a shield. She is seated on what might be a tomb and at her feet are agricultural and industrial items and a vase.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the Industrial and Craft Exhibition held in Malmö in 1896.
